metadata.summary: AI Agent Engine enables LLM-powered agents to analyze detections and interact with LimaCharlie APIs using Gemini models
metadata.primary_use_case: Automate detection analysis and investigation using AI-powered agents with custom instructions and tool access

extracted_apis.description: Start an AI Agent session with a specified agent definition and message
Instantiate the Extension manager object for accessing extensions

cross_refs.description: AI Agent Engine uses the same tools available from the LimaCharlie MCP Server for agent capabilities
